name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

directory.description: The directory at which to create the pipe file. When `--nameAndDirectoryFormat=as-provided`, it will be relative to the current working directory. Otherwise, it will be relative to the workspace root.

nameAndDirectoryFormat.description: Whether to generate the pipe in the directory as provided, relative to the current working directory and ignoring the project (`as-provided`) or generate it using the project and directory relative to the workspace root (`derived`).

project.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. The project will be determined from the directory provided. It will be removed in Nx v19.

flat.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.
flat.x-deprecated: Provide the `directory` option instead and use the `as-provided` format. It will be removed in Nx v19.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

skipImport.description: Do not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

standalone.description: Whether the generated pipe is standalone.

module.description: The filename of the declaring NgModule.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this pipe.
